title: African American artists- styles and purposes

content.question: Using the image, respond to parts A, B, and C. Describe one reason African American artists documented their subjects during the nineteenth and early twentieth centuries as demonstrated by the image of the Garveyite family.Describe one specific example of an African American contribution to an artistic field, other than photography, during the nineteenth or twentieth century.Using a different specific example than used in part B, explain how African Americans used visual media or other artistic fields to advocate for social change in the mid-to-late twentieth century.

frqParts.text: Using the image, respond to parts A, B, and C. Describe one reason African American artists documented their subjects during the nineteenth and early twentieth centuries as demonstrated by the image of the Garveyite family.Describe one specific example of an African American contribution to an artistic field, other than photography, during the nineteenth or twentieth century.Using a different specific example than used in part B, explain how African Americans used visual media or other artistic fields to advocate for social change in the mid-to-late twentieth century.

skill.text: 1.A: Identify and explain course concepts, developments, and processes.
